_comment: Created by ianb on 14/10/2013 11:39:24 using v0.9
title: How has the percentage of quitters changed by age?
analysis_commentary: Under 18s were the age range with the lowest rate of quitters. On average, this was 36%, which is 24% lower than the highest group, those aged 60 and over, which had an average of 59%.
data_source: Health & Social Care Information Centre, Statistics on NHS Stop Smoking Services in  England
